item.title: jmt: todo

item.description:
Blog Project Status

Phase I

  • Base blog design/integration
  • Scrape posts
  • Scrape comments

Phase II

  • Design approval
  • Subpage design adjustments (login page, etc)
  • Unconfirmed: Add page enhancements ( identi.ca, event calendar, etc.)
  • Update any hardlinks if needed. (i.e. author url)
  • Reminder to self: Remove or replace ga code before final rebuild
  • Hand off files/ arrange setup of live blog
